Package org.sat4j

Class AbstractOptimizationLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.AbstractLauncher
      • org.sat4j.AbstractOptimizationLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ILogAble
    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractOptimizationLauncher
extends AbstractLauncher
    Deprecated.
    This class is intended to be used by launchers to solve optimization problems, i.e. problems for which a loop is needed to find the optimal solution. This class is no longer used since 2.3.3
    Author:
    leberre
    See Also:
    ILauncherMode, Serialized Form
